mapper.insert: insert into orderinfo (id,job_id, state, created_time, end_time,employee_id,employer_id) values (null,#{job_id},#{state},#{created_time},#{end_time},#{employee_id},#{employer_id});
mapper.select: select count(id) from `orderinfo` where job_id = #{job_id} and employee_id = #{employee_id}
